articles.author: Matthew Villafane
articles.title: Updated First Alert Weather Team weekend snowfall expectations for NYC, New Jersey, Long Island and Connecticut - CBS New York
articles.description: Our two most reliable models, the European and the GFS, also known as the American model, depict a plowable snow for at least some of the region, but differ on the final totals.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- For snow lovers across the Tri-State area, it's been a difficult last several years. 
CBS2
